OnConnected() OnConnectedPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnConnected
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnConnected ( )[virtual]
Called to signal that the raw connection got established but before the client can call operation on the server.
After the (low level transport) connection is established, the client will automatically send the Authentication operation, which needs to get a response before the client can call other operations.
Your logic should wait for either: OnRegionListReceived or OnConnectedToMaster.
This callback is useful to detect if the server can be reached at all (technically). Most often, it's enough to implement OnDisconnected().
This is not called for transitions from the masterserver to game servers.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.
Definition at line 648 of file PunCockpit.cs.
OnConnectedToMaster() OnConnectedToMasterPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnConnectedToMaster
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnConnectedToMaster ( )[virtual]
Called when the client is connected to the Master Server and ready for matchmaking and other tasks.
The list of available rooms won't become available unless you join a lobby via LoadBalancingClient.OpJoinLobby. You can join rooms and create them even without being in a lobby. The default lobby is used in that case.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.

OnCreateRoomFailed() OnCreateRoomFailedPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnCreateRoomFailed
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnCreateRoomFailed (short returnCode, string message)[virtual]
Called when the server couldn't create a room (OpCreateRoom failed).
The most common cause to fail creating a room, is when a title relies on fixed room-names and the room already exists.
Parameters
returnCode
Operation ReturnCode from the server.
message
Debug message for the error.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.

Called after disconnecting from the Photon server.
It could be a failure or intentional
The reason for this disconnect is provided as DisconnectCause.

OnJoinedLobby() OnJoinedLobbyPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnJoinedLobby
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnJoinedLobby ( )[virtual]
Called on entering a lobby on the Master Server.
The actual room-list updates will call OnRoomListUpdate.
While in the lobby, the roomlist is automatically updated in fixed intervals (which you can't modify in the public cloud). The room list gets available via OnRoomListUpdate.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.
Definition at line 681 of file PunCockpit.cs. Here is the caller graph for this function:
OnJoinedRoom() OnJoinedRoomPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnJoinedRoom
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnJoinedRoom ( )[virtual]
Called when the LoadBalancingClient entered a room, no matter if this client created it or simply joined.
When this is called, you can access the existing players in Room.Players, their custom properties and Room.CustomProperties.
In this callback, you could create player objects. For example in Unity, instantiate a prefab for the player.
If you want a match to be started "actively", enable the user to signal "ready" (using OpRaiseEvent or a Custom Property).
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.
Definition at line 734 of file PunCockpit.cs. Here is the call graph for this function:
Here is the caller graph for this function:
OnJoinRandomFailed() OnJoinRandomFailedPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnJoinRandomFailed
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnJoinRandomFailed (short returnCode, string message)[virtual]
Called when a previous OpJoinRandom call failed on the server.
The most common causes are that a room is full or does not exist (due to someone else being faster or closing the room).
When using multiple lobbies (via OpJoinLobby or a TypedLobby parameter), another lobby might have more/fitting rooms.
Parameters
returnCode
Operation ReturnCode from the server.
message
Debug message for the error.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.

OnLeftLobby() OnLeftLobbyPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnLeftLobby
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnLeftLobby ( )[virtual]
Called after leaving a lobby.
When you leave a lobby, OpCreateRoom and OpJoinRandomRoom automatically refer to the default lobby.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.
Definition at line 716 of file PunCockpit.cs. Here is the call graph for this function:
OnLeftRoom() OnLeftRoomPhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnLeftRoom
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnLeftRoom ( )[virtual]
Called when the local user/client left a room, so the game's logic can clean up it's internal state.
When leaving a room, the LoadBalancingClient will disconnect the Game Server and connect to the Master Server. This wraps up multiple internal actions.
Wait for the callback OnConnectedToMaster, before you use lobbies and join or create rooms.
Reimplemented from Photon.Pun.MonoBehaviourPunCallbacks.

OnRoomPropertiesUpdate() OnRoomPropertiesUpdatePhoton.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpitOnRoomPropertiesUpdate
override void Photon.Pun.Demo.Cockpit.PunCockpit.OnRoomPropertiesUpdate (Hashtable propertiesThatChanged)[virtual]
Called when a room's custom properties changed.
The propertiesThatChanged contains all that was set via Room.SetCustomProperties.
Since v1.25 this method has one parameter: Hashtable propertiesThatChanged.
Changing properties must be done by Room.SetCustomProperties, which causes this callback locally, too.
Parameters
propertiesThatChanged
